name: Character Prompt Generator
description:
Ever wanted to draw or write or do something about a character - your own or someone else's - but just had no ideas?

This versatile prompt generator is designed to help you answer the question 'what am I drawing,' with 100+ prompts and a huge number of combinations. Generate AUs, clothing ideas, different versions of the character, and more, or build up your own prompt to your own tastes.

If you enjoy this generator, please tell your friends, give me a shout out, or consider donating either here or on ko-fi. Also, follow me on twitter or tumblr for updates on this and other generators (I have big plans afoot), as well as art, art process/tutorial videos, RPG content, and much more!

(All characters depicted in artwork are non-binary and use they/them pronouns. Find out more about the generator and the characters on the About page.)
